name: Cyberbike Shootout
description:
Cyberdemons have started emerging across the Lightbridge that that runs through New Central City and you are the only one who can stop them! Rev up your cyberbike and get to work!
In this short and simple top down shooter, you'll move left to right, collecting powerups and destroying waves of enemies on your way to the Archdemon to stop his reign of terror. 
This passion project was created by a first time self-taught Unity developer and features hand drawn visuals and animations. Thank you for your support!
